name: dev
description: This is just a wrapper package which installs some shared devDependencies

scripts.start: npm run start:prepare && npm run start:serv
scripts.start:serv: mkdir -p tmp && concurrently --restart-tries -1 -n babel-fns,emulators -c '#f5da55,#d7aefb' 'npm run functions:build:babel -- --watch' 'firebase emulators:start --inspect-functions --import=tmp/emulators --export-on-exit'
scripts.start:prepare: npm run functions:build && npm run functions:setruntimeconfig
scripts.shell: npm run start:prepare && cd functions && firebase functions:shell
scripts.functions:build: npm run functions:build:babel && cd functions && cp package.json lib/ && cp package-lock.json lib/
scripts.functions:build:babel: cd functions && babel src --out-dir lib --extensions ".ts,.tsx" --source-maps inline
scripts.functions:setruntimeconfig: export GCLOUD_PROJECT=$(firebase use) && node scripts/set-functions-config.js runtimeconfig &&  node scripts/set-functions-config-regions.js runtimeconfig
